title: Saint Seiya Saintia Sho
overview: Saint Seiya Saintia Sho is set immediately after the conclusion of Saint Seiya and promises to address the burning question fans have speculated about for years -- What were the Gold Saints and Athena truly up to as the dramatic events of the series unfolded? Told from the point of view of the Saintias, an exciting new cast of female characters, Saint Seiya Saintia Sho promises to not only be a memorable tribute to past adventures, but send fans on an epic journey full of surprises.
